Bash(python3 -c "
import base64, urllib.request, json
url = ''https://1drv.ms/f/c/39379318741ed739/IgAC0Ua1K6ZbTojh_4hUwuEEAR5LJkf0Qzwm3NtlWE6r91Q?e=wENrpD''
token = ''u!'' + base64.b64encode\(url.encode\(\)\).decode\(\).rstrip\(''=''\).replace\(''/'',''_''\).replace\(''+'',''-''\)
api = f''https://api.onedrive.com/v1.0/shares/{token}/root/children?select=id,name,file&expand=thumbnails''
print\(''API URL:'', api[:100], ''...''\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(api\)
try:
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
    data = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
    print\(''STATUS: 200 OK''\)
    print\(''Items:'', len\(data.get\(''value'',[]\)\)\)
    for item in data.get\(''value'',[]\):
        print\(f""  - {item.get\(''name''\)} \(type: {item.get\(''file'',{}\).get\(''mimeType'',''?''\)}\)""\)
except urllib.error.HTTPError as e:
    print\(f''STATUS: {e.code}''\)
    print\(e.read\(\).decode\(\)\)
")
